00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"

00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00041 
00042 static TagHandle get_tag( Mesh* mesh,
00043                           unsigned num_doubles,
00044                           const std::string& base_name,
00045                           MsqError& err )
00046 {
00047   std::ostringstream str;
00048   str << base_name << num_doubles;
00049   
00050   TagHandle handle = mesh->tag_get( str.str().c_str(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00051   
00052     // double check tag type
00053   std::string temp_name;
00054   Mesh::TagType temp_type;
00055   unsigned temp_length;
00056   mesh->tag_properties( handle, temp_name, temp_type, temp_length, err );
00057   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00058 
00059   if (temp_type != Mesh::DOUBLE || temp_length != num_doubles)
00060   {
00061     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS,
00062                     "Mismatched type or length for existing tag \"%s\"",
00063                      str.str().c_str() );
00064   }
00065   
00066   return handle;
00067 }

00072 WeightReader::WeightReader( std::string name )
00073   : tagBaseName(name) {}
00074 
00075 WeightReader::~WeightReader()
00076 {
00077 }
00078 
00079 double WeightReader::get_weight( PatchData &pd,
00080                                  size_t element,
00081                                  Sample sample,
00082                                  MsqError& err )
00083 {
00084   WeightReaderData& data = get_data( pd );
00085   
00086     // calculate index of sample in array 
00087   NodeSet all_samples = pd.get_samples( element );
00088   unsigned offset = all_samples.num_before( sample );
00089 
00090   if (!data.weights.empty() && data.elementIndex == element) {
00091     assert(offset < data.weights.size());
00092     return data.weights[offset];
00093   }
00094   const unsigned num_samples = all_samples.num_nodes();
00095   const unsigned handle_idx = num_samples - 1;
00096   
00097     // get the tag handle
00098   const TagHandle INVALID_HANDLE = (TagHandle)-1;
00099   if (data.handles.size() <= handle_idx)
00100     data.handles.resize( handle_idx + 1, INVALID_HANDLE );
00101   TagHandle& tag_handle = data.handles[handle_idx];
00102   if (tag_handle == INVALID_HANDLE) {
00103     tag_handle = get_tag( pd.get_mesh(),
00104                           num_samples,
00105                           tagBaseName.c_str(),
00106                           err );
00107     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00108     assert(tag_handle != INVALID_HANDLE);
00109   }
00110   
00111     // get the tag data
00112   data.weights.resize( num_samples );
00113   pd.get_mesh()->tag_get_element_data( tag_handle, 1, 
00114                                        pd.get_element_handles_array() + element,
00115                                        &data.weights[0],
00116                                        err );
00117   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00118     data.weights.clear();
00119     return false;
00120   }
00121   
00122   data.elementIndex = element;
00123   
00124   assert(offset < num_samples);
00125   return data.weights[offset];
00126 }

00130   
00131 void WeightReader::notify_patch_destroyed( WeightReaderData& data )
00132 {
00133   data.handles.clear();
00134   data.weights.clear();
00135 }
00136 
00137 void WeightReader::notify_new_patch( PatchData&, WeightReaderData& data )
00138 {
00139   data.weights.clear();
00140 }
00141 
00142 void WeightReader::notify_sub_patch( PatchData& pd, 
00143                                      WeightReaderData& data,
00144                                      PatchData& subpatch,
00145                                      const size_t* ,
00146                                      const size_t* ,
00147                                      MsqError& err )
00148 {
00149   WeightReaderData& other = get_data(subpatch);
00150   if (other.handles.empty()) 
00151     other.handles = data.handles;
00152 }
